== Update a CDS instance ==
''Change an exisiting CDS instance.'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': PUT [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /cds/<id>/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': UPDATE [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': Unspecified [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': a CDS object [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''parameters''': mapping of property to value to change; valid changes: name, description, sync_schedule, cluster_id [[BR]]
[[BR]]
